mapper.insert: insert into user_session (user_no, platform, device_id, jti, push_token, issued_at, expires_at, revoked, user_agent, ip, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userNo}, #{platform}, #{deviceId}, #{jti}, #{pushToken}, #{issuedAt}, #{expiresAt}, #{revoked}, #{userAgent}, #{ip}, now(3), now(3)) on duplicate key update jti = #{jti}, issued_at = #{issuedAt}, expires_at = #{expiresAt}, revoked = #{revoked}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, ip = #{ip}
mapper.update: update user_session set revoked = 1 where jti = #{jti} and revoked = 0 -- 이미 취소된 건 건드리지 않음
